system.description: For the real cowboy in all of us. These ain’t ya daddy’s death sticks - they’re full-bodied and come with quite a kick. They deal [[/roll 1D4]] damage per puff, but cause the user to roll on the @UUID[Compendium.neon-lords.tables.RollTable.BIDFFaLxG6ywrUF8]{Drug Effects} Table. Being super-expensive, with the signature Ace of Spades logo on each stick, they grant the user a +2 to their Attitude S.T.A.T.S.
